components.description:
A yellow smiley face melting into a puddle. 

The eyes and mouth slip down the face, yet still maintain a distorted smile. This quality lends this emoji to sarcasm.

Can be used literally to talk about extreme heat. Can also be used metaphorically to talk about embarrassment, shame, a slowly sinking sense of dread, or feeling overwhelmed in some way.
components.title: Melting Face

description:

title: Melting Face

version.description:
Unicode 14.0 is the version of the Unicode Standard released on September 14, 2021. 37 new emoji code points were added in this release, with all 112 new emojis (including sequences for skin tones) listed under Emoji 14.0.

New emojis added in this release are update expected to come to major platforms in either late 2021 or early 2022.

This release of this Unicode Standard was delayed from March 2021 due to COVID-19. 

  • üìù Unicode 14.0 details on Unicode.org

apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the melting face emoji presents a surreal, almost liquid-like visage, with its features smoothly dissolving downwards. This Apple rendering captures a sense of overwhelming emotion, like extreme embarrassment, heat, or a feeling of being completely done, conveyed through subtle gradients and soft, rounded edges that suggest a fluid state. The overall effect is both humorous and relatable, perfectly embodying that moment when you wish you could just melt away, as seen on Apple‚Äôs vibrant displays.
